// Questionnaire 1 strings STR DEX CON INT WIS CHA Choose Your Character\'s Name Next Questionnaire When creating a character in the world of Dungeons and Dragons, the first questions you should ask yourself is what you want your character\'s race, class, and alignment to be. These questions will determine many things such as certain stat bonuses, starting equipment, hit die, and more! The two most common ways to choose your stat values are as follows: Option 1 is to roll 4d6, drop the lowest number, then record the total. Do this 6 times for 6 totals and choose which number to put for each stat. Option 2 is to use the numbers 15, 14, 13, 12, 10, and 8 on whichever stat you choose. The numbers MUST be between 3 and 18. Consult your DM for more options.
